content.question: Which of the following explains the most likely reason why English colonists wanted to come to North America?

choices.label: To put distance between themselves and the English monarchy
To exercise their strong belief in natural rights and liberty for all
To seek economic opportunity and improved living conditions
To form alliances with French and Dutch settlers already present

content.answer: To seek economic opportunity and improved living conditions
